item.title: Welcome!
item.description: This site is powered by Mukha Static Site Generator. Source files for this site are available at github. Mukha SSG itself is on the early stages of development, github mirror is also available.

item.title: Tags
item.description: Tags are generated automatically, just list them in frontmatter, Mukha will do the rest. Thanks to the unidecode library, you can use tags in any language (almost).
